mapper.select: SELECT info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN FROM INFO where i_no = #{i_no} and i_del_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AllCount FROM INFO WHERE INFO_ID = 'HOLDNOTI' OR INFO_ID = 'NOTICE'

SELECT INFO_NAME AS INFONAME, I_NO AS INO, I_TITLE AS ITITILE, I_CONTENT AS ICONTENT, TO_CHAR(I_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE, I_DEL_YN AS DELYN FROM INFO INNER JOIN INFO_GROUP ON (INFO_GROUP.INFO_ID = INFO.INFO_ID) WHERE INFO_GROUP.INFO_ID = 'NOTICE' AND I_DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM INFO WHERE INFO_ID = 'NOTICE'

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order BY i_No ASC) as NUM, info.info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN from INFO_GROUP left join info on(info_group.info_ID = info.info_id) where info_group.info_ID = info.info_id and info_name = '공지사항' and i_del_yn = 'N') where NUM between 1 and 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM INFO WHERE INFO_ID ='FAQ'
SELECT INFO_ID as infoId , I_NO as iNo , I_TITLE as iTitle , I_CONTENT as iContent , I_REGDATE as iRegdate , I_IMAGE as iImage , I_DEL_YN as iDelYN FROM INFO WHERE INFO_ID ='FAQ'
